summary: This bill, titled the "TBI and PTSD Treatment Act," proposes an amendment to Title 38 of the U.S. Code. It would mandate the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to furnish hyperbaric oxygen therapy to veterans suffering from traumatic brain injury (TBI) or post-traumatic stress disorder (PTSD). The bill specifies that this treatment should be provided through community-based health care providers, effectively expanding the healthcare options available to veterans for these specific conditions through the Department of Veterans Affairs.
